title: MUSA 5080 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Weekly Notes: My learning reflections and key concepts
Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




My name is Zheng Qianmu, and I come from an urban and rural planning background. I am currently a MUSA student. My email address is zheng21@upenn.edu, and my GitHub username is xqdqc_hub. I am taking this course to learn R, a highly powerful data analysis tool. Through friends in urban management studies, I have learned that quantitative analysis in public policy is a crucial component of both academic research and government work. I hope to gain relevant knowledge and have the opportunity to participate in a comprehensive policy analysis project.




Email: zheng21@upenn.edu
GitHub: @xqdqc_hub
